workout_file.author: COACH
workout_file.name: W1-Saturday-Endurance-90mins
workout_file.description: Total duration: 90 minutes. A longer session to improve fatigue resistance, combining Sweet Spot with sustained Endurance riding. Based on FTP of 228W.

textevent.message: Activators: 30 seconds easy, 30 seconds at FTP.
Activators complete. Main set is next.
Main set begins. 20 minutes at Sweet Spot (210W).
Settle in and find a strong, sustainable rhythm.
10 minutes down, 10 to go. Stay focused.
Great work. 5 minutes of easy recovery spinning at 115W.
Now for the endurance block. 45 minutes at 160W.
This is about building your base. Keep the effort steady and controlled.
15 minutes in. Your breathing should be deep but not labored.
30 minutes done. Keep fueling and hydrating.
Endurance block complete. Prepare for a final push.
Final 7 minutes! Push the power up to Tempo (185W).
This simulates finishing a ride strong when you're already tired. Dig deep!
Excellent session. Time for a well-deserved cool-down.
Workout complete. Great job this week.
